video_prompt: A serene woman's contemplative expression gently shifts, her magical purple eyes subtly pulsating. Her luminous, mint-green hair undulates and shimmers as if light-infused. Perched on her head, a fantastical creature subtly shifts its gaze, its yellow-gold eyes flickering. Her iridescent hood shimmers, shifting through greens, blues, purples, and oranges. In the background, emerald and gold architectural details subtly shift with ethereal light, while a teardrop pendant's iridescent 'eye' slowly pulsates. In the foreground, an antique pocket watch gently sways, its delicate gold hands slowly ticking. Ethereal light ebbs and flows across the scene, intensifying the internal glow of elements.
image_prompt:
A serene, ethereal woman in profile, with pale luminous skin, large glowing purple eyes, dark lashes, and plum lips. Her hair is long, flowing, luminous mint green. A fantastical emerald cat-griffin with yellow-gold eyes perches on her head. She wears a delicate golden headpiece with a purple gem and a magnificent holographic iridescent cloak/hood with faceted, shifting colors.

The setting is mystical and richly detailed: opulent gothic/art nouveau architecture in deep greens and gold, intricate gold lines, an iridescent "eye" pendant, and geometric patterns. In the lower right foreground, an antique golden pocket watch with elaborate filigree and baroque details.

Art style: digital artwork, anime-inspired character, highly detailed textures, soft ethereal lighting, glowing elements, dreamlike atmosphere. Vibrant palette dominated by emerald and mint greens, rich gold, and iridescent purples.
refined_video_prompt: A woman's contemplative expression gently shifts, her purple eyes subtly pulsating. Mint-green hair undulates and shimmers with internal light. A fantastical creature perched on her head subtly shifts its gaze, its yellow eyes flickering. Her iridescent hood shimmers, shifting through a spectrum of colors. In the background, architectural details subtly shift with ethereal light, while a pendant's iridescent 'eye' slowly pulsates. A foreground pocket watch gently sways, its hands slowly ticking. Ethereal light ebbs and flows across the scene, intensifying the glow of all elements.
